thread.title_full: Jimi Hendrix estate to shop owner: Excuse us while we sue you to get our guit... - Cleveland.com - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Cleveland.com
title: Jimi Hendrix estate to shop owner: Excuse us while we sue you to get our guit... - Cleveland.com
text:
The Arizona Daily Star in Tucson reported Sunday that Experience Hendrix LLC, the company that runs Hendrix's estate, wants a Pima County Superior Court judge to order the guitar returned. According to the Oct. 2, complaint, the estate says Harvey Moltz, owner of Rainbow Guitars, is not the rightful owner of the Black Widow acoustic guitar.
 Cleveland.com.
